entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 11:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NNE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to ice pellets or snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over the isthmus. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
